summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 9482, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Second Avenue North, from Highland Drive to Lee Street; Lee Street, from Second Avenue North to First Avenue; Warren Avenue, from Lee Street to Galer Street; Orange Place, from Lee Street to Galer Street; Galer Street, from Second Avenue North to First Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks along both side thereof under Ordinance No. 556, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
